correct_order: The job of a manager in the workplace is to get things done through employees.
To do this, the manager should be able to motivate his/her employees.
It is not as simple as it appears.
Motivation practices and theories are difficult subjects relying on several disciplines.

sources: Motivation practices and theories are difficult subjects relying on several disciplines.
To do this, the manager should be able to motivate his/her employees.
